{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/96","id":2892178027,"node_id":"PR_kwDOOcuOYs6sYyJr","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/96","diff_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/96.diff","patch_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/96.patch","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/96","number":96,"state":"open","locked":false,"title":"Feat/editable feed urls fixed","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"## Description\r\n\r\nThis PR adds the ability to edit feed URLs directly from the UI. Users can now click the edit button (✎) on any feed widget to update the feed URL, which automatically updates the feed name and site link.\r\n\r\n## Changes\r\n\r\n### Backend\r\n- Added `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>` endpoint for updating feed URLs and properties\r\n- Implemented validation to prevent duplicate feed URLs\r\n- Added CORS configuration for development\r\n- Updated port configuration to 5001 for development\r\n\r\n### Frontend\r\n- Added edit button to each feed widget\r\n- Implemented modal dialog for editing feed URLs\r\n- Added comprehensive error handling and validation\r\n\r\n### Testing\r\n- Added comprehensive tests for the new functionality\r\n- All existing tests continue to pass\r\n\r\n## Testing Notes\r\n- Backend tests require a running Redis service container\r\n- Dynamic port handling for Redis in CI environments\r\n- Environment variable `CACHE_REDIS_PORT` can override default Redis port\r\n\r\n## Deployment\r\n- Updated configuration for development environment\r\n- Maintains compatibility with existing production deployment\r\n\r\nThis feature allows users to easily update feed URLs when they change or need correction.","created_at":"2025-10-06T23:08:20Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T23:10:22Z","closed_at":null,"merged_at":null,"merge_commit_sha":"ecca129c0aaa685a818646b5a463bfff236c0c15","assignee":null,"assignees":[],"requested_reviewers":[],"requested_teams":[],"labels":[],"milestone":null,"draft":false,"commits_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/96/commits","review_comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/96/comments","review_comment_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments{/number}","comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/96/comments","statuses_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/statuses/e03a350d73ce626dea594212f4f04b7884f8cd54","head":{"label":"sheepdestroyer:feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed","ref":"feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed","sha":"e03a350d73ce626dea594212f4f04b7884f8cd54","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"repo":{"id":969641570,"node_id":"R_kg message:
Summary: ## CONTEXT-AWARE STATE SUMMARY

**USER_CONTEXT**: Implement feature to make each widget's feed URL editable. Address code review feedback from PR #95. User closed previous PRs and opened PR #95 with fresh review comments.

**TASK_TRACKING**: 
- **Active Tasks**: 
  - TASK-22: Address Google Code Assist review comments from PR #95 (IN PROGRESS)

**COMPLETED**:
- ✅ Fixed critical syntax errors in `createFeedWidget` function (inconsistent indentation, extra closing braces)
- ✅ Committed and pushed syntax fixes to branch `feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed`
- ✅ All previous PR #92 review comments addressed
- ✅ PR #95 created with all previous fixes

**PENDING**:
- Fix CORS configuration to be environment-variable configurable (MEDIUM priority)
- Fix cache invalidation logic in feed update endpoint (HIGH priority)
- Mark PR #95 as "ready to review" after addressing all comments

**CURRENT_STATE**:
- Working in branch: `feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed`
- Latest commit: cba50fa "fix: correct syntax errors in createFeedWidget function"
- PR #95 created with current state

**CODE_STATE**:
- **Backend**: `/workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py` - CORS configuration needs syntax fixes
- **Frontend**: `createFeedWidget` function now properly renders feed items
- **Critical Fix**: Feed item rendering logic restored within `createFeedWidget` function

**TESTS**:
- All backend tests passing (74/74, 1 skipped)

**CHANGES**:
- **Backend**: CORS configuration being updated to use environment variables
- **Frontend**: Syntax errors in feed rendering logic resolved

**CODE_REVIEW_FEEDBACK_STATUS**:
- **PR #95 comments to address**:
  1. **HIGH PRIORITY**: Cache invalidation logic - should invalidate cache immediately after feed properties change, not just when new items are found
  2. **MEDIUM PRIORITY**: CORS allowed origins should be configurable via environment variables
  3. **IN PROGRESS**: Fixing CORS configuration syntax errors

**VERSION_CONTROL_STATUS**: 
- Repository: `/workspace/SheepVibes`
- Current branch: `feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed`
- Latest commit: cba50fa "fix: correct syntax errors in createFeedWidget function"
- Changes successfully pushed to remote repository
- PR Status: PR #95 created with current state

**NEXT STEPS**: 
1. Fix CORS configuration syntax errors
2. Address cache invalidation logic in update_feed_url endpoint
3. Mark PR #95 as "ready to review"
4. Await fresh code review from Google Code Assist

**CRITICAL NOTE**: The CORS configuration currently has syntax errors with incorrect quotes that need immediate fixing.
